alert.note: Alert for Inland Citrus; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Citrus and northern Sumter Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bushnell, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Wildwood, Bushnell, Inverness Airport, Inverness Highlands South, Lake Panasoffkee, Webster, Coleman, Rutland, Wahoo, Adamsville, Tarrytown, Withlapopka Isle, Sumterville, Gospel Island, Nobleton, Floral City and Istachatta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
